item.title: llm.c rough notes
item.description: I - Getting the defaults working Fix linux-tools broken install with sudo dpkg -i --force-overwrite /var/cache/apt/archives/linux-tools-common_*.deb and then sudo apt --fix-broken install Get nvcc (CUDA compiler driver) with sudo apt install nvidia-cuda-toolkit Initial command ./train_gpt2fp32cu doesn’t work due to OOM issue. Decreasing batch size and sequence length doesn’t work ./train_gpt2fp32cu -b 1 -t 512 See GPU usage stats with nvidia-smi and sudo fuser -v /dev/nvidia* and kill process using the significant GPU resources with kill -9 <pid>.
